about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Bella Beauty - Where natural beauty, high quality, and dedication converge. We are committed to bringing the best cosmetic products to Vietnamese women.
about.storyPara1: Bella Beauty was founded in 2020 with a simple vision: to bring natural and radiant beauty to every Vietnamese woman.
about.storyPara2: From the early days with a small collection of premium skincare products, we have grown into a trusted brand by thousands of customers across the country.
about.storyPara3: We believe that every woman deserves to feel beautiful in her own skin, and our mission is to provide the best tools and products to help them do just that.
about.valuesDesc: These values guide all our activities and decisions

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.desc: We always put customers at the center, committed to providing the best experience.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: Every product is carefully selected, ensuring the highest standards.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Constantly updating trends and new technologies in the beauty industry.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Building a community of confident women who love themselves and spread beauty.

about.missionDesc: Our mission is to empower Vietnamese women to embrace their natural beauty through high-quality, safe, and effective cosmetic products.
about.missionPoint1: Provide authentic, high-quality products from reputable brands
about.missionPoint2: Professional consultation to help customers find the most suitable products
about.missionPoint3: Build a community of confident women who love and care for themselves
about.missionPoint4: Commitment to excellent customer service and wonderful shopping experience
about.teamDesc: The talented and passionate people behind Bella Beauty's success
about.ctaDesc: Explore our collection of premium cosmetic products and discover your natural beauty.
